results.title: The Chromosomes of man
results.brief_description: Methods of preparing cells for chromosome study in the laboratory. Photomicrography of cell division shows how chromosomes split and build up two daughter sets with the same number of chromosomes. The film also shows abnormal arrangements and concludes with the analysis used in studies of cancer.

results.title: The Christmas visitor
results.creator_credit: John Halas, Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Phoenix Films
results.brief_description: Presents an animated adaptation of Clement Moore’s poem entitled A visit from St. Nicholas. While Santa is resting, the toys from his bundle burst forth in a flurry of activity and the adventure of Christmas begins.

results.title: The Chosen people
results.creator_credit: Brian Lewis, Peter Montagnon and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “The Long Search”.
In this video Ronald Eyre explores the concept of “the chosen people” and the significance of the holocaust with Eli Wiesel, the leader of the Amadeus Quartet, a Jerusalem rabbi and a New York lawyer. He also discovers the Jewish love of words and argument, which stems from their need to constantly reinterpret the word of God, and their propensity to illustrate their arguments with humorous stories and jokes.

results.title: The Chordates Diversity in Structure
results.brief_description: Basic characteristics that relate all chordates, from tiny tunicates to world-ruling primates, are explained. Also describes the diversity and adaptations of vertebrates, the most advanced chordates, with special reference to the relationship between structure and potential for survival

results.title: The Choice is yours
results.brief_description: Very explicitly the film explains the causes, symptoms, possible effects and treatment of gonorrhea and syphilis, and how it differs between men and women. Suggestions are made on precautions to take, and it is pointed out that unlike most other diseases the contracting of these is absolutely up to the individual and early VD can be cured quite simply.

results.title: The Choice
results.creator_credit: Gordon Begg, Imperial Chemical Industries and Millbank Films
results.brief_description: Surveys the results of pollution by all kinds of waste products in the natural environment: air, water and land, and discusses the counter-measures and better disposal methods being used. Stresses the need for industry, commerce, individuals and the community to be prepared to take action.

results.title: The Choice
results.brief_description: The staff of a high school newspaper decide to do an issue on the drug problem, by dividing into two groups to research the pros and cons of drug taking. Projects the message that before a choice is made in favour of the non-medical use of drugs one should be fully aware of the dangers to mental and physical health inherent in such a choice. Intended mainly for school children. NOTE: Restricted to tertiary institutions, teaching hospitals, police and customs departments.
